description.text: Secret page alters the contents of a page so that it appears to be something entirely different. The text of a spell can be changed to show another spell of equal or lower level known by the caster. This spell cannot be used to change a spell contained on a scroll, but it can be used to hide a scroll. Explosive runes or sepia snake sigil can be cast upon the secret page.

sections.Components: V, S, M (powdered herring scales and a vial of will-o'-wisp essence)
sections.Targets: page touched, up to 3 sq. ft. in size
